import React, { useRef } from "react"; function Home() { const containerRef = useRef(null); // Function to handle smooth scrolling const scrollToNextPage = () => { const container = containerRef.current; if (container) { container.scrollTo({ top: container.scrollTop + container.clientHeight, behavior: "smooth", }); } }; return (
